## WorkerFixtures.vmKeyboard property

Reference to the VMKeyboard object that allows to control the keyboard at the virtual machine level (low-level enough so that the screen reader can catch those keyboard events).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
vmKeyboard: VMKeyboard;
```
